title: Mercury finally gets released
content: Finally its been released; Its so fantastic, can�t wait to find a job that will pay for it. Its really taken the best things of Fleischmann and really improved on them. Well done Jonathan Hoefer and Tobias Frere- Jones. Its breathtaking and I haven�t been so excited since my mum bought me Judy Garland sings at Carnegie Hall
author: jamie_olivier

comments.content:
I agree, I've been waiting for this for EVER. Does anyone know if the fractions are tabular or proportionally spaced? Maybe I'm wrong, but don't all kinds of numbers need to be proprtionally spaced for setting in text, even fractions?   
   
By the way Jamie, I hope you're kidding about that Judy Garland CD. It's rubbish!

You really don�t know what your missing; doing some stuff in Indesign with the Headphones on cranking Judy up to 11 (eat your heart out Nigel Tufnell), gets me soo inspired.   
   
I ve loved this typeface ever since I saw it in Esquire and its just great that I can finally start using it

Hey Yves, will you be comparing Mercury and Farnham in your 'Bald Condensed'?   
   
Battle of the Young Giants!
Oh my, I noticed I did my 1000th Typophile above. Gotta cut down on this...
